posts.post_title: FS: T205 Mathewson, nicest low grade
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Dave H
For sale:

T205 Christy Mathewson Gold Border, Piedmont Fact 25 back in a newly graded PSA 1.  This card has the front of a PSA 5 (no creases, very minimal corner wear, no edge wear with beautiful gold border), but the back has paper loss deserving of the grade (no creases).  Perfect card for display of front, or a low-grade Matty.  $200 delivered, paypal no extra cost.

Please email me for high-quality scans, DHarford@satx.rr.com
Dave
